"Volledige web op de telefoon" Onderdeel in die grote update is een mobiele versie van IE9 met hardware-acceleratie voor Windows Phone. Dit is een goed voorbeeld van het samenbrengen van onderdelen binnen Microsoft om de gebruikservaring van Windows Phone te verbeteren, aldus Steve Ballmer . "We moeten het volledige web naar de telefoon brengen." and Justin Vivian Bond , music and lyrics by Sandra Bernhard , Justin Vivian Bond , Lance Horne and Jake Shears . Rob Moose will be the musical director. The new musical, according to press notes, features Bernard and Justin Vivian Bond , who play country cousins whose lives have led them in very different directions. One went from being a rock chick to born again motherhood in the Midwest and the other from small town gay to urban art world sophisticate. When the two meet up again at a family wedding they set of on a journey rediscovering their authentic selves and learning that ideology doesn't mean much when stacked up against art love and really good acid. For more information visit Joespub.com.
